title: Cant post on other peoples Boards
body: It says must be level 7 but im past that and i cant post on the boards still :(

replies.body: Apparently making your own discussion post fixes this, as my issue was fixed after i posted this.
Yip yip! Making a post here in H&S or using the syncing tool at the top will get a sync done for you if this Boards Level ever messes up again!
